description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain
false_positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
name: Bitsadmin Download from Suspicious Domain
query: (process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/transfer\ * OR *\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:(*raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com*))
author: Florian Roth
